channel.title: [advice] My Armour Set [advice]
channel.description:
yh k well first off this is my first time with any of this rs modelling and all this is, is a recolour but ive just wanted to get started with something first and well, the wield models dont seem to be working ><, i .dat them, i typed the models on the client, added to class.8, added models to model folder and they rnt working, if done this b4 with santa hat, same exact thing, just im using barrows items this time >< heres some pics( i hope), and also some of the skillcape base models i've recoloured r glitched a lil on the wield models, the yop half of the cape becomes invisible, but say i wear my armour i made(which also goes invisible) the cape shows up as it normally should have, ny suggestions?? any help would b appreciated thx o.o
[IMG]http://i643.photobucket.com/albums/uu153/ellevillepr0digy/09-03-31195829.png[/img] [IMG]http://i643.photobucket.com/albums/uu153/ellevillepr0digy/09-03-31195742.png[/img] [IMG]http://i643.photobucket.com/albums/uu153/ellevillepr0digy/09-03-31195659.png[/img]

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 10:49:09 am[/size][hr][quote=“0bbyme, post:4, topic:270459”]umm did you triangulate the faces?[/quote]

erm im new to all this, but what do u mean by triangulate the faceS? o.O
